text: Robert Owens Tiernan (February 24, 1929 â€“ October 15, 2014) is an American lawyer and politician. He was from Rhode Island. He served in the Rhode Island State Senate. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives. Tiernan was born in Providence, Rhode Island. Tiernan died in South Kingstown, Rhode Island on October 15, 2014, aged 85. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Lawyers from Rhode Island Category:Politicians from Providence, Rhode Island Category:United States representatives from Rhode Island Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert Tiernan
